eTable 4
Regression analysis of community and function CAGs versus host factors GRS and DQS.
```{r echo=FALSE}
d0 <- read.csv("/Users/ccw/Dropbox/research.db/zongqi.db/Microbiome/microbiome_manuscript/Final_working/TABLES/Tables_09AUG2021/eTables/eTable4.8pg.sCAGs_fCAGS_v_GRS_DQS.17SEP2021.MD.csv", as.is=T, header=T)
names(d0) <- c("Host feature",	"SE category"	,"CAG", 	"beta", "CI",	"p-value",	"FDR (stratified)")
datatable(d0)
```
Maaslin2 regression (n=64) analysis adjusting for age, sex, BMI at 18, BMI at enrollment, DQS, history of mono, current smoker, and GRS.

eTable 5
Regression analysis of species, subspecies, and function CAGs, with cell type proportion as derived by PBMC RNA-seq.
```{r echo=FALSE}
d0 <- read.csv("/Users/ccw/Dropbox/research.db/zongqi.db/Microbiome/microbiome_manuscript/Final_working/TABLES/Tables_09AUG2021/eTables/eTable5.19pg.CAGs_v_celltype_proportion.02FEB2021.RMD.csv", as.is=T, header=T)
names(d0) <- c("Host feature",	"SE category"	,"CAG", 	"beta", "CI",	"p-value",	"FDR (stratified)")
datatable(d0)
```
Linear regression (n=43), adjusting for age, and sex.
